name: ROI2dataset
author: AFNI Developers
description: Transforms a series of ROI files to a node dataset

inputs.description: ROI files to turn into a data set (space-separated list). This parameter MUST be the last one on command line.
inputs.name: Input ROI files

inputs.description: Output one column (sub-brick) for each ROI value.
inputs.name: Keep separate flag

inputs.description: Prefix for a set of .1D files that contain a list of node indices in the order they appear in an ROI.
inputs.name: Nodelist

inputs.description: Prefix for a set of .1D files that contain a list of node indices in the order they appear in an ROI, with duplicate nodes removed.
inputs.name: Nodelist without duplicates

inputs.description: Also add the ROI value as a second column in .1D files output by -nodelist.
inputs.name: Nodelist with ROI value

inputs.description: Write a label dataset instead of a simple dataset. Sets output format to NIML.
inputs.name: Label dataset

inputs.description: Output format of dataset. One of: ni_bi, ni_as, 1D
inputs.name: Output format

inputs.description: Idcode of domain parent. Only ROIs with the same domain parent are included in the output.
inputs.name: Domain parent ID

inputs.description: Output a full dataset from node 0 to node max_index (total of max_index + 1 nodes).
inputs.name: Pad to node

inputs.description: Use padding_label (an integer) to label nodes not part of any ROI. Default is 0.
inputs.name: Pad label
